## ChildChangeEvent type

There are some events every node must emit when something changes on children.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ChildChangeEvent<T> = ChildAddedEvent<T> | ChildRemovedEvent<T> | ChildInitializedEvent<T>;
```
<b>References:</b> [ChildAddedEvent](./treex-js.childaddedevent.md)<!-- -->, [ChildRemovedEvent](./treex-js.childremovedevent.md)<!-- -->, [ChildInitializedEvent](./treex-js.childinitializedevent.md)
